org.fileprocessor

Interface FileProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFileProcessor

    public interface FileProcessor
    Basic scaffolding that simply breaks text in lines and invokes @see org.fileprocessor.LineProcessor#process(). It relies on user-provided @link org.fileprocessor.LineProcessor for implementing the desired line analysis

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Validation processFile(java.lang.String fileName)
      Invokes @see FileProcessor#processFile above by populating processors List with the org.fileprocessor.DefaultLineProcessor.
      Validation processFile(java.lang.String fileName, java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      Invokes @see FileProcessor#processFile above by populating processors List with the org.fileprocessor.DefaultLineProcessor
      Validation processFile(java.lang.String fileName, LineProcessor processor, java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      Invokes @see FileProcessor#processFile above by populating processors List with the provided @link org.fileprocessor.LineProcessor.
      Validation processFile(java.lang.String fileName, java.util.List<LineProcessor> processors, java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      This method is ultimately used by all other overloaded methods in this interface.
      Validation processFile(java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String charsetString)
      Invokes @see FileProcessor#processFile above by populating processors List with the org.fileprocessor.DefaultLineProcessor

    • Method Detail

      • processFile

        Validation processFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                       java.util.List<LineProcessor> processors,
                       java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        This method is ultimately used by all other overloaded methods in this interface.
        Parameters:
        fileName - URL of the file to be read.
        processors - List of line processors to be applied to each line in the file. @link org.fileprocessor.DefaultLineProcessor is loaded of null.
        charset - Encoding of the file. Default OS encoding is loaded if null.
        Returns:
        org.fileprocessor.Validation object containing result of processing and descriptive message.

      • processFile

        Validation processFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                       java.lang.String charsetString)
        Invokes @see FileProcessor#processFile above by populating processors List with the org.fileprocessor.DefaultLineProcessor
        Parameters:
        fileName - URL of the file to be read.
        charsetString - String representing a valid JVM encoding for the file. Default OS encoding is loaded if null.
        Returns:
        org.fileprocessor.Validation object containing result of processing and descriptive message.

      • processFile

        Validation processFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                       java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Invokes @see FileProcessor#processFile above by populating processors List with the org.fileprocessor.DefaultLineProcessor
        Parameters:
        fileName - URL of the file to be read.
        charset - Encoding of the file. Default OS encoding is loaded if null.
        Returns:
        org.fileprocessor.Validation object containing result of processing and descriptive message.

      • processFile

        Validation processFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Invokes @see FileProcessor#processFile above by populating processors List with the org.fileprocessor.DefaultLineProcessor. It also assumes the local default (OS) encoding to handle the file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - URL of the file to be read.
        Returns:
        org.fileprocessor.Validation object containing result of processing and descriptive message.

      • processFile

        Validation processFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                       LineProcessor processor,
                       java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Invokes @see FileProcessor#processFile above by populating processors List with the provided @link org.fileprocessor.LineProcessor.
        Parameters:
        fileName - URL of the file to be read.
        processor - LineProcessor to be applied to each line in the file.
        charset - Encoding of the file. Default OS encoding is loaded if null.
        Returns:
        org.fileprocessor.Validation object containing result of processing and descriptive message.
